param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module, this allows individual module styling

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed above the registration fields

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post-text
param.description: This is the Text or HTML that is displayed below the registration fields

param.name: termslink
param.label: Terms and Conditions Link
param.description: Enter the URL of what page your terms and conditions are located on

param.name: images
param.label: Enable the user field key images
param.description: These are the images that show directly below the submit button
